fn edgeVerts obj theEdge = (
if not (classof obj == Editable_mesh or classof obj == triMesh) do return undefined if theEdge < 1 or theEdge >(obj.numfaces*3) do return undefined local theFace = ((theEdge-1)/3)+1 local theVerts = getFace obj theFace format "\t face index:% face:%" theFace theVerts case ((mod (theEdge-1)3) as integer) of (
0: point2 theVerts.x theVerts.y 1: point2 theVerts.y theVerts.z 2: point2 theVerts.z theVerts.x ) ) fn getSelectedEdgeLength = (
local obj = selection[1] local selEdge = (getEdgeSelection obj as array)[1] local eVerts = edgeVerts obj selEdge format "\tObj:% Edge:% Verts:%" obj.name selEdge eVerts distance obj.verts[eVerts[1]].pos obj.verts[eVerts[2]].pos ) format " Length:%\n" (getSelectedEdgeLength())
